Description.Name: Svelte Sobral
Description.Details:
Svelte Sobral is something of an oddity amongst the well-known MechWarriors within the Inner Sphere. While regarded as a great MechWarrior, this is not what Svelte is known for. Nor is he amongst those infamous for war crimes. Instead, Svelte is known for being cursed.

No one is sure how or why he is cursed, only that bad luck seems to befall all his employers shortly after the end of his contracts with them. Svelte has found himself blamed for the collapse of the Rasalhague Dominion, the Aurigan Directorate, a Free Worlds League-wide HPG blackout, and a failed Wolf invasion of the Magistracy of Canopus.

As a member of a group called "The New Wolverines", many questions have been raised by his employers, including questions of his origin, any allegiances, and who or what were the old wolverines if these are the new ones? Svelte, however, doesn't seem to ever answer these questions.

Despite his cursed nature, Svelte still finds employers willing to pay for his services, hoping to avoid the curse that seems to follow him around.

Even after the collapse and disbanding of TNW, Svelte could be found fighting for one cause or another before ultimately disappearing. What exactly happened to the mighty MechWarrior is not exactly known. Some say his curse finally caught up with him proper, and even stranger rumors suggest he was disembodied and turned into a sentient fax machine by the mysterious Casparamaris and left at some backwater location of the Golden Corral.
